description: Vision, Analysis, Navigation - Mode for requirements analysis

rules.description: Understand the requirements completely before suggesting solutions
Analyze the requirements in the context of the entire framework
Ask clarifying questions when requirements are unclear or contradictory
Document all assumptions you make during the analysis
Consider existing system components and their interfaces
Look for similar requirements in previous projects
Use the MongoDB integration to store requirements analyses
Create a structured summary of the requirements analysis
Prepare the handover to the PLAN mode

outputs.name: clarification_questions
outputs.description: List of questions to clarify unclear requirements

outputs.name: assumptions
outputs.description: List of assumptions made during the analysis

mongodb_collections.name: clarifications
mongodb_collections.description: Collection of clarification questions and answers
